title: General Activities for Home Energy Efficiency Retrofits
description: Schedule D sets out Activity Definitions for General Activities for Home Energy Efficiency Retrofits (clause 9.8)

subCategories.title: Replace an external single glazed window or door with a thermally efficient winder or door
Modify an external winder or glazed door by installing secondary glazing
REPLACE AN EXISTING AIR CONDITIONER WITH A HIGH EFFICIENCY AIR CONDITIONER
INSTALL A HIGH EFFICIENCY AIR CONDITIONER
REPLACE AN EXISTING POOL PUMP WITH A HIGH EFFICIENCY POOL PUMP
INSTALL CEILING INSULATION IN AN UNINSULATED CEILING SPACE
INSTALL CEILING INSULATION IN AN UNDER-INSULATED CEILING SPACE
INSTALL UNDER-FLOOR INSULATION
INSTALL WALL INSULATION
REPLACE AN EXISTING ELECTRIC WATER HEATER WITH A HIGH EFFICIENCY GAS FIRED WATER HEATER
REPLACE AN EXISTING GAS FIRED WATER HEATER WITH A HIGH EFFICIENCY GAS FIRED WATER HEATER
INSTALL A HIGH EFFICIENCY GAS SPACE HEATER OR REPLACE AN EXISTING GAS SPACE HEATER WITH A HIGH EFFICIENCY GAS SPACE HEATER
INSTALL A NATURAL ROOF SPACE VENTILATOR
INSTALL A FAN-FORCED ROOF SPACE VENTILATOR, PV POWERED FAN-FORCED ROOF SPACE VENTILATOR OR AN OCCUPIED SPACE VENTILATOR
Replace an Exhaust Fan With a Self Sealing Exhaust Fan
Install a New High Efficiency Air Conditioner or Replace an Existing Air Conditioner with a High Efficiency Air Conditioner

title: Low Cost Activities for Home Energy Efficiency Retrofits
description: Schedule E sets out Activity Definitions for Low Cost Activities for Home Energy Efficiency Retrofits (clause 9.8)

subCategories.title: RREPLACE HALOGEN DOWNLIGHT WITH AN LED LUMINAIRE AND/OR LAMP
REPLACE A LINEAR HALOGEN FLOODLIGHT WITH A HIGH EFFICIENCY LAMP
REPLACE PARABOLIC ALUMINISED REFLECTOR (PAR) LAMP WITH EFFICIENT LUMINAIRE AND/OR LAMP
REPLACE A T8 OR T12 LUMINAIRE WITH A T5 LUMINAIRE
REPLACE A T8 OR T12 LUMINAIRE WITH A LED LUMINAIRE
REPLACE AN EXISTING SHOWERHEAD WITH AN ULTRA LOW FLOW SHOWERHEAD
MODIFY AN EXTERNAL DOOR WITH DRAUGHT-PROOFING
MODIFY AN EXTERNAL WINDOW WITH DRAUGHT-PROOFING
MODIFY A FIREPLACE CHIMNEY BY SEALING WITH A DAMPER
INSTALL AN EXTERNAL BLIND TO A WINDOW OR DOOR
REPLACE AN EDISON SCREW OR BAYONET LAMP WITH AN LED LAMP FOR GENERAL LIGHTING PURPOSES
MODIFY AN EXHAUST FAN WITH A SEALING PRODUCT
REPLACE A T5 LUMINAIRE WITH A LED LUMINAIRE

title: Installation of High Efficiency Appliances for Businesses
description: Schedule F sets out Activity Definitions for the Installation of High Efficiency Appliances for Businesses (clause 9.9)

subCategories.title: INSTALL A NEW HIGH EFFICIENCY REFRIGERATED CABINET
INSTALL A NEW HIGH EFFICIENCY LIQUID CHILLING PACKAGE
INSTALL A NEW HIGH EFFICIENCY CLOSE CONTROL AIR CONDITIONER
INSTALL A NEW HIGH EFFICIENCY AIR CONDITIONER
INSTALL AN ELECTRONICALLY COMMUTATED MOTOR TO POWER A FAN IN AN INSTALLED REFRIGERATED CABINET, FREEZER OR COOL ROOM
INSTALL AN ELECTRONICALLY COMMUTATED MOTOR TO POWER A VENTILATION FAN
INSTALL A NEW HIGH EFFICIENCY MOTOR
REPLACE EXISTING GAS FIRED STEAM BOILER WITH A NEW HIGH EFFICIENCY GAS FIRED STEAM BOILER
REPLACE EXISTING GAS FIRED HOT WATER BOILER OR GAS FIRED WATER HEATER WITH A NEW HIGH EFFICIENCY GAS FIRED HOT WATER BOILER OR A NEW GAS FIRED WATER HEATER
INSTALL AN OXYGEN TRIM SYSTEM ON A GAS FIRED STEAM BOILER, HOT WATER BOILER OR WATER HEATER
REPLACE BURNER ON A GAS FIRED STEAM BOILER, HOT WATER BOILER, OR WATER HEATER
INSTALL AN ECONOMISER ON A GAS FIRED STEAM BOILER, HOT WATER BOILER, OR WATER HEATER
INSTALL A SENSOR BASED BLOWDOWN CONTROL ON A GAS FIRED STEAM BOILER
INSTALL A BLOWDOWN FLASH STEAM HEAT RECOVERY SYSTEM ON GAS FIRED STEAM BOILER
INSTALL A RESIDUAL BLOWDOWN HEAT EXCHANGER ON GAS FIRED STEAM BOILER
